overview: Mile End Purgatorio is Guy Sherwin and Martin Doyleâ€™s one minute hymn to the London road via its shop signs. A heady rapid-fire brew of Dante, Shakespeare, the Bible and William Blake, its visual text is storefront correlated, its theme the crisis on the journey, its rhythms all of daily life, and celebratory in its observations of the seemingly known.
title: Mile End Purgatorio
